climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: COOL GEL INFUSION: Designed for cooler sleep, this memory foam pillow is infused with temperature regulating gel and ventilated to increase breathability and help dissipate body heat for a more comfortable sleep temperature

CONTOURING MEMORY FOAM: Super soft yet supportive memory foam contours to your head, neck, and shoulders to provide superior pressure relief that keeps you sleeping soundly and helps you wake up feeling refreshed and ready to go

REMOVABLE POLYESTER COVER: This supportive memory foam pillow is finished with a super soft and durable polyester cover with a zippered closure that makes it easy to remove for hassle-free machine washing

AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES: Whether you are finishing the primary suite or the kid's room, this pillow is available in Standard, Queen, and King sizes to get the job done; you can also purchase a two-pack for double the comfort and convenience

QUALITY MATERIALS AND EASY SHIPPING: Made to last, this pillow is CertiPUR-US certified meaning it is made from the highest quality materials; foam pillow is compressed, rolled, and shipped in a box, fluff vigorously to fully decompress before use
body.description: Find maximum comfort while you sleep with the Weekender Gel Memory Foam Pillow. This ventilated bed pillow is made from super soft memory foam that contours to your head, neck, and shoulders to create personalized and cozy comfort while you sleep. Plush and supportive memory foam is infused with a temperature regulating gel and dotted with precision ventilation holes to help keep you cool and comfortable while you sleep. All of that comfortable goodness is topped with a super soft and durable polyester cover with a zippered finish so you can easily remove it and toss it in the washing machine to keep your bed pillow fresh. Available as a single pillow or a convenient two-pack, this firm pillow is an excellent choice for side, back, and even stomach sleepers. Compressed for easy shipping, fluff this pillow after opening and enjoy your best night’s sleep yet.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Universally Supportive With three different sizes to choose from and a universally comfortable mid-loft design, this pillow is great for back, stomach, and side sleepers. Removable Cover Ultra-soft removable cover is built to maintain quality through multiple washings to ensure a simple and fresh experience night after night. Ventilated Design Pincore technology creates a ventilated design that optimizes air circulation for prime airflow and temperature control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Favorite Pillow
reviews.reviewText: So, Bed Bath & Beyond closed recently and I was devastated. I got a specific pillow there which I've had for at least 3 years that isn't made anymore even direct supply from the manufacturer! When I needed a new pillow, I was worried I wouldn't find a dense, firm pillow with cooling like my old one had. While it's not exactly the same, this pillow is a pretty darn good replacement. I'm a side sleeper with shoulder and neck issues, and this pillow is a good amount of support but still comfortable enough to sleep on. I do wish it held it's shape just slightly more than it does, but it's much better than a "standard" memory foam pillow. It's not quite as cool as my old pillow (which had a layer of cooling gel on top of the pillow, this one is just built-in to the pillow itself) it does seem to keep decently cool throughout the night. I'm glad to have a decent replacement pillow, and on sale this one was half the cost of my last. I'd say it's worth trying out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars no more neck pain
reviews.reviewText: The pillow is the mosto comfy ever. I was having neck pain before my purchase. One night with my new pillow and I was able to sleep more comfortably that in the pst six months. I did not get hot or cold nor was i tossing and turning all night. I do sleep on my side and belly down and I had no problems with this product. I cannot say it enough... the best sleep in months!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good pillow for the money
reviews.reviewText: Good value. Not overly heavy like some memory foam pillows can be. Also not super stinky like some memory foam pillows can be. Not super soft, not super firm. To me, a medium density pillow. If you like a flat pillow, this isn't for you, otherwise I think this pillow is a good middle-of-the-road,all-around pillow for most folks. A good pillow for guests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soo I have been on the search for a nicE pillow that didn't flatten after a week & since we got a king bed we needed a king pillow anyway so I purchased this one. I am a side sleeper who like to rest their leg on something while sleeping and I have used this pillow for that purpose and let me say it's been THE BEST PURCHASE EVER !!! I have had this pillow a few years now and I couldn't be more happier !! It's nice & firm but not too firm but also not too soft it's the PERFECT amount of firmness. I can not stress enough you need this pillow if you're a fellow side sleeper too. I do want to note that the cover is removable & washable ! So that's a plus too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for side sleepers
reviews.reviewText: I would recommend this highly if you are a side sleeper and like a firmer pillow. It is supports my head nicely when I sleep on the side. Not as comfortable when I lie on my back as the memory foam is a bit too firm. Pillow stays relatively cool compared to some other memory foam pillows I have had in the past.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This pillow was close to perfect, but…..
reviews.reviewText: I have been on the hunt for a new king size pillow for months now. I really thought this one was it. It’s well- made, soft, lightweight and foamy. When I first sunk my head into it, it did that gentle sink that foam pillows do. However, this pillow is TALL. Nearly 5 inches. It seemed to continue to expand a day or two after removing from package. I gave it 3 nights, but it gave me headaches each night and was just a bit too high for my neck. I had to return. Too bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good enough I bought two more
reviews.reviewText: I am in no way compensated for this review. I'm surprised this pillow doesn't have a better rating. I bought one for myself after a year and a half of both in-store and online pillow shopping. I was surpingly satisfied. It didn't bowl me over in any specific way, and maybe that's just what some of us need in a pillow. I'm in my 40s and have a bad back. This pillow offered moderate support at the right height, moderate firmness/softness. It was low-key perfect. No more neck aches, no fidgeting with the pillow in the wee hours to get a comfy fit. Pro-tip: put the wider side of the pillow toward your neck or downward, if that makes sense. Not above your head, but under your neck of face.My husband was also complaining about a pillow he'd got in store so I had him try mine. This was a year after I bought mine, and it's held up well. He liked it, so I bought one for him and he's a happy camper. Somehow it even suits his thick neck and broad shoulders. I'm slender, myself.I also got a back up for myself, a third pillow. In case this specific pillow become unavailable in the future. I don't want to go nearly two years again searching for an adequate replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this product!! I would often wake up with headaches from sleeping on regular pillows for some reason. With the memory foam, this pillow never flattens out completely so there is never any pressure on any part of your head, only support. It’s not super soft, but it is extremely comfortable. I find myself sleeping MUCH better after switching to this one. Works well with back or side sleeping. So happy I bought this.

reviews.reviewTitle: exactly what i was looking for
reviews.reviewText: was worried at first but glad i bought them

Es una gran almohada. Estoy cambiando de colchón y almohadas tradiciones a memory foam y esta es mi primera experiencia. La almohada llegó antes que el colchón y lo dejé reposar 24 horas como indica el instructivo, aunque noté que estuvo listo después de 5 horas dejándolo reposar, respeté el instructivo. Al día siguiente lo usé un momento y me quedé dormido sin darme cuenta. En la noche lo utilicé y también caí dormido sin darme cuenta y, lo mejor de todo, sin dolor de cuello.No encuentro ningún defecto de fábrica, ni gusanos, ni bichos como dicen otros comentarios, ni tampoco malos olores, sólo el olor a "nuevo" que se quitó al día siguiente, pero no lo notas al menos que de verdad inhales muy profundo. Es una gran almohada y en promoción es una gran inversión. Como es mi primera almohada memory foam y mi primera experiencia con ellos, no puedo comparar con otras marcas: pero sí puedo decir que es la mejor almohada que he comprado y estoy casi seguro de que también lo disfrutarás.Lo único que podría decir es que tardó 2 días en llegar, pero en realidad vale la pena la espera de esos 2 días más las 24 horas de dejarlo reposar para usarlo; aunque, si tienes alguna emergencia, es mejor que optes por otra compra.
Non capisco come tanti possano apprezzare questo tipo di cuscino: altissimo e durissimoForse è soggettivo

Dieses Kissen ist wirklich klasse, mein Kopf/Nacken wird im Schlaf super gestützt. Ich habe keinerlei Probleme. Bei der Größe des Kissens, benötigt man allerdings einen großen Kissenbezug.Alles in allem aber ein super Kissen.
Nice foam pillow that holds its shape quite well for a supportive sleep. Just wish it was slightly bigger.
